title: People defend a female "gamer", called scum.
body:
People defend a Rioter and suddenly they are a saint. 


News flash, if you're not mentally equipped to deal with such a high stress community such as this one you probably shouldn't be leading the charge. Nor should you be making such radical changes. 

Sorry to say but your feelings are the last thing on my mind when it comes to bettering a service I care about. So if you're going to play the victim card just leave now. 


Yes it sucks people are being assholes to you and I'll try to be as respectful as possible but honestly were you expecting any different when you've provoked them so much? When you've ignored serious issues and have only responded to meaningless praise?{{champion:104}} 
~~
